frontmatter.title: Fluid Feature Rollout For Ruby On Rails
frontmatter.description: In this blog post I am going to introduce a new service for Ruby On Rails developers called FluidFeatures that helps you manage rolling out new features to your site and provides a way to easily do A/B testing (competing versions of a feature) right in the belly of your code.

frontmatter.title: Rollout, Degrade, Metrics and Capacity
frontmatter.description: Last week I attended a presentation by James Golick, CTO of fetlife.com. Intriguingly advertised as Scaling a Website to 300 Million Page Views Per Month with
